name: FataliTea
description:
FataliTea is a tea based management/fighting game.

Brew your tea, make it stronger and use your tea to defeat your opponents.

Key Features
  • Nearly 20 different hats.
  • Brew your favorite teas.
  • Raise your gent.
  • Fights to the death.
Credits
  • Harrison Kerr
  • Mikail Khan
  • Sebastian Scaini
